text: Combs may refer to: ==Places== === France === * Combs-la-Ville, a commune in the southeastern suburbs of Paris === United Kingdom === *Combs, Derbyshire, England *Combs, Suffolk, England === United States === *Combs, Arkansas, a community *Combs, Kentucky, a community *Combs Township, Carroll County, Missouri ==Other uses== *Comb, plural form *Combs (surname) ==See also== *Comb (disambiguation) *Combes (disambiguation) * Justice Combs (disambiguation) * Coombs (disambiguation) * Cwm (disambiguation) * Coombes
title: Combs
